title.en: Biographies of Bai Qi and Wang Jian
title.raw: 《白起王翦列傳》 Biographies of Bai Qi and Wang Jian

sentences.zh: 白起者，郿人也。

translations.text: Bai Qi, Mei man.

sentences.zh: 善用兵，事秦昭王。

translations.text: Skilled use troops, served Qin Zhao Wang.

sentences.zh: 昭王十三年，而白起為左庶長，將而擊韓之新城。

translations.text: Zhao Wang thirteen years, Bai Qi as left chancellor, general attack Han Xin Cheng.

sentences.zh: 是歲，穰侯相秦，舉任鄙以為漢中守。

translations.text: This year, Marquis of Rang chancellor Qin, recommended Ren Bi as Han Zhong guard.

sentences.zh: 其明年，白起為左更，攻韓、魏於伊闕，斬首二十四萬，又虜其將公孫喜，拔五城。

translations.text: Next year, Bai Qi as left more, attacked Han Wei at Yi Guan, beheaded twenty four thousand, moreover captured their general Gong Sun Xi, took five cities.

sentences.zh: 起遷為國尉。

translations.text: Qi promoted to state wei.

sentences.zh: 涉河取韓安邑以東，到乾河。

translations.text: Crossed Yellow River took Han An Yi east, to Qian River.

sentences.zh: 明年，白起為大良造。

translations.text: Next year, Bai Qi as da liang zao.

sentences.zh: 攻魏，拔之，取城小大六十一。

translations.text: Attacked Wei, took it, took cities big small sixty one.

sentences.zh: 明年，起與客卿錯攻垣城，拔之。

translations.text: Next year, Qi with guest qing Cuo attacked Yuan Cheng, took it.

sentences.zh: 後五年，白起攻趙，拔光狼城。

translations.text: After five years, Bai Qi attacked Zhao, took Guang Lang city.

sentences.zh: 後七年，白起攻楚，拔鄢、鄧五城。

translations.text: After seven years, Bai Qi attacked Chu, took Yan Deng five cities.

sentences.zh: 其明年，攻楚，拔郢，燒夷陵，遂東至竟陵。

translations.text: Next year, attacked Chu, took Ying, burned Yi Ling, then east to Jing Ling.

sentences.zh: 楚王亡去郢，東走徙陳。

translations.text: Chu Wang fled from Ying, east fled moved Chen.

sentences.zh: 秦以郢為南郡。

translations.text: Qin made Ying as Nan Jun.

sentences.zh: 白起遷為武安君。

translations.text: Bai Qi promoted to Wu An Jun.

sentences.zh: 武安君因取楚，定巫、黔中郡。

translations.text: Wu An Jun because took Chu, pacified Wu Qian Zhong jun.

sentences.zh: 昭王三十四年，白起攻魏，拔華陽，走芒卯，而虜三晉將，斬首十三萬。

translations.text: Zhao Wang thirty four years, Bai Qi attacked Wei, took Hua Yang, routed Mang Mao, captured three Jin generals, beheaded thirteen thousand.

sentences.zh: 與趙將賈偃戰，沈其卒二萬人於河中。

translations.text: With Zhao general Jia Yan battle, drowned their troops twenty thousand in river.

sentences.zh: 昭王四十三年，白起攻韓陘城，拔五城，斬首五萬。

translations.text: Zhao Wang forty three years, Bai Qi attacked Han Xing Cheng, took five cities, beheaded five thousand.

sentences.zh: 四十四年，白起攻南陽太行道，絕之。

translations.text: Forty four years, Bai Qi attacked Nan Yang Tai Xing road, cut it.

Bai Qi, Mei man. Skilled use troops, served Qin Zhao Wang. Zhao Wang thirteen years, Bai Qi as left chancellor, general attack Han Xin Cheng. This year, Marquis of Rang chancellor Qin, recommended Ren Bi as Han Zhong guard. Next year, Bai Qi as left more, attacked Han Wei at Yi Guan, beheaded twenty four thousand, moreover captured their general Gong Sun Xi, took five cities. Qi promoted to state wei. Crossed Yellow River took Han An Yi east, to Qian River. Next year, Bai Qi as da liang zao. Attacked Wei, took it, took cities big small sixty one. Next year, Qi with guest qing Cuo attacked Yuan Cheng, took it. After five years, Bai Qi attacked Zhao, took Guang Lang city. After seven years, Bai Qi attacked Chu, took Yan Deng five cities. Next year, attacked Chu, took Ying, burned Yi Ling, then east to Jing Ling. Chu Wang fled from Ying, east fled moved Chen. Qin made Ying as Nan Jun. Bai Qi promoted to Wu An Jun. Wu An Jun because took Chu, pacified Wu Qian Zhong jun. Zhao Wang thirty four years, Bai Qi attacked Wei, took Hua Yang, routed Mang Mao, captured three Jin generals, beheaded thirteen thousand. With Zhao general Jia Yan battle, drowned their troops twenty thousand in river. Zhao Wang forty three years, Bai Qi attacked Han Xing Cheng, took five cities, beheaded five thousand. Forty four years, Bai Qi attacked Nan Yang Tai Xing road, cut it.

sentences.zh: 四十五年，伐韓之野王。

translations.text: Forty five years, attacked Han Ye Wang.

sentences.zh: 野王降秦，上黨道絕。

translations.text: Ye Wang surrendered Qin, Shang Dang road cut.

sentences.zh: 其守馮亭與民謀曰：「鄭道已絕，韓必不可得為民。

translations.text: Its guard Feng Ting with people planned: Zheng road already cut, Han certainly cannot become people.

sentences.zh: 秦兵日進，韓不能應，不如以上黨歸趙。

translations.text: Qin troops day advance, Han cannot respond, not as with Shang Dang belong Zhao.

sentences.zh: 趙若受我，秦怒，必攻趙。

translations.text: Zhao if accept us, Qin angry, certainly attack Zhao.

sentences.zh: 趙被兵，必親韓。

translations.text: Zhao suffer troops, certainly close Han.

sentences.zh: 韓趙為一，則可以當秦。」

translations.text: Han Zhao become one, then can match Qin.

sentences.zh: 因使人報趙。

translations.text: Because made person report Zhao.

sentences.zh: 趙孝成王與平陽君、平原君計之。

translations.text: Zhao Xiao Cheng Wang with Ping Yang Jun, Ping Yuan Jun planned it.

sentences.zh: 平陽君曰：「不如勿受。

translations.text: Ping Yang Jun said: Not as not accept.

sentences.zh: 受之，禍大於所得。」

translations.text: Accept it, calamity greater than obtained.

sentences.zh: 平原君曰：「無故得一郡，受之便。」

translations.text: Ping Yuan Jun said: Without reason obtain one jun, accept convenient.

sentences.zh: 趙受之，因封馮亭為華陽君。

translations.text: Zhao accepted it, because enfeoffed Feng Ting as Hua Yang Jun.

Forty five years, attacked Han Ye Wang. Ye Wang surrendered Qin, Shang Dang road cut. Its guard Feng Ting with people planned: Zheng road already cut, Han certainly cannot become people. Qin troops day advance, Han cannot respond, not as with Shang Dang belong Zhao. Zhao if accept us, Qin angry, certainly attack Zhao. Zhao suffer troops, certainly close Han. Han Zhao become one, then can match Qin. Because made person report Zhao. Zhao Xiao Cheng Wang with Ping Yang Jun, Ping Yuan Jun planned it. Ping Yang Jun said: Not as not accept. Accept it, calamity greater than obtained. Ping Yuan Jun said: Without reason obtain one jun, accept convenient. Zhao accepted it, because enfeoffed Feng Ting as Hua Yang Jun.

sentences.zh: 四十六年，秦攻韓緱氏、藺，拔之。

translations.text: Forty six years, Qin attacked Han Gou Shi, Lin, took them.
Forty six years, Qin attacked Han Gou Shi, Lin, took them.

sentences.zh: 四十七年，秦使左庶長王龁攻韓，取上黨。

translations.text: Forty seven years, Qin made left chancellor Wang He attack Han, took Shang Dang.

sentences.zh: 上黨民走趙。

translations.text: Shang Dang people fled Zhao.

sentences.zh: 趙軍長平，以按據上黨民。

translations.text: Zhao army Chang Ping, to press control Shang Dang people.

sentences.zh: 四月，龁因攻趙。

translations.text: Four months, He because attacked Zhao.

sentences.zh: 趙使廉頗將。

translations.text: Zhao made Lian Po general.

sentences.zh: 趙軍士卒犯秦斥兵，秦斥兵斬趙裨將茄。

translations.text: Zhao army soldiers violated Qin outpost troops, Qin outpost troops beheaded Zhao deputy general Jie.

sentences.zh: 六月，陷趙軍，取二鄣四尉。

translations.text: Six months, trapped Zhao army, took two barriers four wei.

sentences.zh: 七月，趙軍筑壘壁而守之。

translations.text: Seven months, Zhao army built ramparts walls guarded it.

sentences.zh: 秦又攻其壘，取二尉，敗其陣，奪西壘壁。

translations.text: Qin again attacked their ramparts, took two wei, defeated their battle formation, seized west ramparts walls.

sentences.zh: 廉頗堅壁以待秦，秦數挑戰，趙兵不出。

translations.text: Lian Po firm walls to await Qin, Qin several challenged, Zhao troops not emerge.

sentences.zh: 趙王數以為讓。

translations.text: Zhao Wang several because this rebuked.

sentences.zh: 而秦相應侯又使人行千金於趙為反閒，曰：「秦之所惡，獨畏馬服子趙括將耳，廉頗易與，且降矣。」

translations.text: Qin chancellor Ying Hou moreover made person spend thousand gold at Zhao as reverse agent, said: Qin feared, only fear Ma Fu Zi Zhao Kuo general ear, Lian Po easy with, moreover surrender already.

sentences.zh: 趙王既怒廉頗軍多失亡，軍數敗，又反堅壁不敢戰，而又聞秦反閒之言，因使趙括代廉頗將以擊秦。

translations.text: Zhao Wang already angry Lian Po army many lost perished, army several defeated, moreover reverse firm walls not dare battle, moreover heard Qin reverse agent words, because made Zhao Kuo replace Lian Po general to attack Qin.

sentences.zh: 秦聞馬服子將，乃陰使武安君白起為上將軍。

translations.text: Qin heard Ma Fu Zi general, then secretly made Wu An Jun Bai Qi as supreme general.

sentences.zh: 而王龁為尉裨將，令軍中有敢泄武安君將者斬。

translations.text: Wang He as wei deputy general, ordered army have dare leak Wu An Jun general behead.

sentences.zh: 趙括至，則出兵擊秦軍。

translations.text: Zhao Kuo arrived, then sent troops attack Qin army.

sentences.zh: 秦軍詳敗而走，張二奇兵以劫之。

translations.text: Qin army feigned defeat fled, spread two surprise troops to ambush them.

sentences.zh: 趙軍逐勝，追造秦壁。

translations.text: Zhao army pursued victory, chased reached Qin walls.

sentences.zh: 壁堅拒不得入，而秦奇兵二萬五千人絕趙軍後，又一軍五千騎絕趙壁閒，趙軍分而為二，糧道絕。

translations.text: Walls firm resisted could not enter, Qin surprise troops twenty five thousand cut Zhao army rear, moreover one army five thousand cavalry cut Zhao walls between, Zhao army divided into two, grain road cut.

sentences.zh: 而秦出輕兵擊之。

translations.text: Qin sent light troops attack them.

sentences.zh: 趙戰不利，因筑壁堅守，以待救至。

translations.text: Zhao battle disadvantage, because built walls firm guarded, await rescue arrive.

sentences.zh: 秦王聞趙食道絕，王自之河內，賜民爵各一級，發年十五以上悉詣長平，遮絕趙救及糧食。

translations.text: Qin Wang heard Zhao food road cut, wang personally to He Nei, granted people rank each one level, mobilized age fifteen above all go Chang Ping, blocked Zhao rescue and grain.

Forty seven years, Qin made left chancellor Wang He attack Han, took Shang Dang. Shang Dang people fled Zhao. Zhao army Chang Ping, to press control Shang Dang people. Four months, He because attacked Zhao. Zhao made Lian Po general. Zhao army soldiers violated Qin outpost troops, Qin outpost troops beheaded Zhao deputy general Jie. Six months, trapped Zhao army, took two barriers four wei. Seven months, Zhao army built ramparts walls guarded it. Qin again attacked their ramparts, took two wei, defeated their battle formation, seized west ramparts walls. Lian Po firm walls to await Qin, Qin several challenged, Zhao troops not emerge. Zhao Wang several because this rebuked. Qin chancellor Ying Hou moreover made person spend thousand gold at Zhao as reverse agent, said: Qin feared, only fear Ma Fu Zi Zhao Kuo general ear, Lian Po easy with, moreover surrender already. Zhao Wang already angry Lian Po army many lost perished, army several defeated, moreover reverse firm walls not dare battle, moreover heard Qin reverse agent words, because made Zhao Kuo replace Lian Po general to attack Qin. Qin heard Ma Fu Zi general, then secretly made Wu An Jun Bai Qi as supreme general. Wang He as wei deputy general, ordered army have dare leak Wu An Jun general behead. Zhao Kuo arrived, then sent troops attack Qin army. Qin army feigned defeat fled, spread two surprise troops to ambush them. Zhao army pursued victory, chased reached Qin walls. Walls firm resisted could not enter, Qin surprise troops twenty five thousand cut Zhao army rear, moreover one army five thousand cavalry cut Zhao walls between, Zhao army divided into two, grain road cut. Qin sent light troops attack them. Zhao battle disadvantage, because built walls firm guarded, await rescue arrive. Qin Wang heard Zhao food road cut, wang personally to He Nei, granted people rank each one level, mobilized age fifteen above all go Chang Ping, blocked Zhao rescue and grain.

sentences.zh: 至九月，趙卒不得食四十六日，皆內陰相殺食。

translations.text: To nine months, Zhao troops not obtain food forty six days, all internal secretly mutually killed ate.

sentences.zh: 來攻秦壘，欲出。

translations.text: Came attack Qin ramparts, wished emerge.

sentences.zh: 為四隊，四五復之，不能出。

translations.text: Made four teams, four five repeated, could not emerge.

sentences.zh: 其將軍趙括出銳卒自搏戰，秦軍射殺趙括。

translations.text: Their general Zhao Kuo emerged elite troops personally fought, Qin army shot killed Zhao Kuo.

sentences.zh: 括軍敗，卒四十萬人降武安君。

translations.text: Kuo army defeated, troops forty thousand people surrendered Wu An Jun.

sentences.zh: 武安君計曰：「前秦已拔上黨，上黨民不樂為秦而歸趙。

translations.text: Wu An Jun planned: Before Qin already took Shang Dang, Shang Dang people not happy be Qin return Zhao.

sentences.zh: 趙卒反覆。

translations.text: Zhao troops changeable.

sentences.zh: 非盡殺之，恐為亂。」

translations.text: Not all kill them, fear become chaos.

sentences.zh: 乃挾詐而盡阬殺之，遺其小者二百四十人歸趙。

translations.text: Then deceived all pit killed them, sent their young two hundred forty return Zhao.

sentences.zh: 前後斬首虜四十五萬人。

translations.text: Before after beheaded captured forty five thousand people.

sentences.zh: 趙人大震。

translations.text: Zhao greatly shocked.

To nine months, Zhao troops not obtain food forty six days, all internal secretly mutually killed ate. Came attack Qin ramparts, wished emerge. Made four teams, four five repeated, could not emerge. Their general Zhao Kuo emerged elite troops personally fought, Qin army shot killed Zhao Kuo. Kuo army defeated, troops forty thousand people surrendered Wu An Jun. Wu An Jun planned: Before Qin already took Shang Dang, Shang Dang people not happy be Qin return Zhao. Zhao troops changeable. Not all kill them, fear become chaos. Then deceived all pit killed them, sent their young two hundred forty return Zhao. Before after beheaded captured forty five thousand people. Zhao greatly shocked.

sentences.zh: 四十八年十月，秦復定上黨郡。

translations.text: Forty eight years ten months, Qin again pacified Shang Dang jun.

sentences.zh: 秦分軍為二：王龁攻皮牢，拔之；

translations.text: Qin divided army two: Wang He attacked Pi Lao, took it;

sentences.zh: 司馬梗定太原。

translations.text: Si Ma Geng pacified Tai Yuan.

sentences.zh: 韓、趙恐，使蘇代厚幣說秦相應侯曰：「武安君禽馬服子乎？」

translations.text: Han Zhao feared, made Su Dai thick gifts advised Qin chancellor Ying Hou: Wu An Jun captured Ma Fu Zi?
Said: Correct.

sentences.zh: 又曰：「即圍邯鄲乎？」

translations.text: Moreover said: Then surround Han Dan?
Said: Correct.

sentences.zh: 「趙亡則秦王王矣，武安君為三公。

translations.text: Zhao perish then Qin Wang wang, Wu An Jun become three gong.

sentences.zh: 武安君所為秦戰勝攻取者七十餘城，南定鄢、郢、漢中，北禽趙括之軍，雖周、召、呂望之功不益於此矣。

translations.text: Wu An Jun for Qin battle victory attack take seventy more cities, south pacified Yan Ying Han Zhong, north captured Zhao Kuo army, though Zhou Zhao Lu Wang merit not surpass this.

sentences.zh: 今趙亡，秦王王，則武安君必為三公，君能為之下乎？

translations.text: Now Zhao perish, Qin Wang wang, then Wu An Jun certainly become three gong, jun can be below him?

sentences.zh: 雖無欲為之下，固不得已矣。

translations.text: Though no desire be below, certainly cannot already.

sentences.zh: 秦嘗攻韓，圍邢丘，困上黨，上黨之民皆反為趙，天下不樂為秦民之日久矣。

translations.text: Qin once attacked Han, surrounded Xing Qiu, trapped Shang Dang, Shang Dang people all rebelled for Zhao, world not happy be Qin people days long.

sentences.zh: 今亡趙，北地入燕，東地入齊，南地入韓、魏，則君之所得民亡幾何人。

translations.text: Now perish Zhao, north land enter Yan, east land enter Qi, south land enter Han Wei, then jun obtained people perish how many people.

sentences.zh: 故不如因而割之，無以為武安君功也。」

translations.text: Therefore not as because divide them, no make Wu An Jun merit.

sentences.zh: 於是應侯言於秦王曰：「秦兵勞，請許韓、趙之割地以和，且休士卒。」

translations.text: Then Ying Hou spoke Qin Wang: Qin troops tired, please permit Han Zhao divide land peace, moreover rest soldiers.

sentences.zh: 王聽之，割韓垣雍、趙六城以和。

translations.text: Wang listened, divided Han Yuan Yong, Zhao six cities peace.

sentences.zh: 正月，皆罷兵。

translations.text: First month, all stopped troops.

sentences.zh: 武安君聞之，由是與應侯有隙。

translations.text: Wu An Jun heard, from this with Ying Hou had gap.

Forty eight years ten months, Qin again pacified Shang Dang jun. Qin divided army two: Wang He attacked Pi Lao, took it; Si Ma Geng pacified Tai Yuan. Han Zhao feared, made Su Dai thick gifts advised Qin chancellor Ying Hou: Wu An Jun captured Ma Fu Zi? Said: Correct. Moreover said: Then surround Han Dan? Said: Correct. Zhao perish then Qin Wang wang, Wu An Jun become three gong. Wu An Jun for Qin battle victory attack take seventy more cities, south pacified Yan Ying Han Zhong, north captured Zhao Kuo army, though Zhou Zhao Lu Wang merit not surpass this. Now Zhao perish, Qin Wang wang, then Wu An Jun certainly become three gong, jun can be below him? Though no desire be below, certainly cannot already. Qin once attacked Han, surrounded Xing Qiu, trapped Shang Dang, Shang Dang people all rebelled for Zhao, world not happy be Qin people days long. Now perish Zhao, north land enter Yan, east land enter Qi, south land enter Han Wei, then jun obtained people perish how many people. Therefore not as because divide them, no make Wu An Jun merit. Then Ying Hou spoke Qin Wang: Qin troops tired, please permit Han Zhao divide land peace, moreover rest soldiers. Wang listened, divided Han Yuan Yong, Zhao six cities peace. First month, all stopped troops. Wu An Jun heard, from this with Ying Hou had gap.

sentences.zh: 其九月，秦復發兵，使五大夫王陵攻趙邯鄲。

translations.text: Its nine months, Qin again sent troops, made wu da fu Wang Ling attack Zhao Han Dan.

sentences.zh: 是時武安君病，不任行。

translations.text: This time Wu An Jun ill, not able go.

sentences.zh: 四十九年正月，陵攻邯鄲，少利，秦益發兵佐陵。

translations.text: Forty nine years first month, Ling attacked Han Dan, little profit, Qin moreover sent troops assist Ling.

sentences.zh: 陵兵亡五校。

translations.text: Ling troops perished five xiao.

sentences.zh: 武安君病愈，秦王欲使武安君代陵將。

translations.text: Wu An Jun illness cured, Qin Wang wished make Wu An Jun replace Ling general.

sentences.zh: 武安君言曰：「邯鄲實未易攻也。

translations.text: Wu An Jun said: Han Dan indeed not easy attack.

sentences.zh: 且諸侯救日至，彼諸侯怨秦之日久矣。

translations.text: Moreover feudal lords rescue day arrive, those feudal lords resent Qin days long.

sentences.zh: 今秦雖破長平軍，而秦卒死者過半，國內空。

translations.text: Now Qin though broke Chang Ping army, Qin troops dead over half, domestic empty.

sentences.zh: 遠絕河山而爭人國都，趙應其內，諸侯攻其外，破秦軍必矣。

translations.text: Far cut river mountain contend other state capital, Zhao respond internal, feudal lords attack external, break Qin army certain.

sentences.zh: 不可。」

translations.text: Not acceptable.

sentences.zh: 秦王自命，不行；

translations.text: Qin Wang self commanded, not go;

sentences.zh: 乃使應侯請之，武安君終辭不肯行，遂稱病。

translations.text: Made Ying Hou request him, Wu An Jun finally declined not willing go, then claimed illness.

Its nine months, Qin again sent troops, made wu da fu Wang Ling attack Zhao Han Dan. This time Wu An Jun ill, not able go. Forty nine years first month, Ling attacked Han Dan, little profit, Qin moreover sent troops assist Ling. Ling troops perished five xiao. Wu An Jun illness cured, Qin Wang wished make Wu An Jun replace Ling general. Wu An Jun said: Han Dan indeed not easy attack. Moreover feudal lords rescue day arrive, those feudal lords resent Qin days long. Now Qin though broke Chang Ping army, Qin troops dead over half, domestic empty. Far cut river mountain contend other state capital, Zhao respond internal, feudal lords attack external, break Qin army certain. Not acceptable. Qin Wang self commanded, not go; Made Ying Hou request him, Wu An Jun finally declined not willing go, then claimed illness.

sentences.zh: 秦王使王龁代陵將，八九月圍邯鄲，不能拔。

translations.text: Qin Wang made Wang He replace Ling general, eight nine months surrounded Han Dan, could not take.

sentences.zh: 楚使春申君及魏公子將兵數十萬攻秦軍，秦軍多失亡。

translations.text: Chu made Chun Shen Jun and Wei Gong Zi led troops several tens thousand attacked Qin army, Qin army many lost perished.

sentences.zh: 武安君言曰：「秦不聽臣計，今如何矣！」

translations.text: Wu An Jun said: Qin not listen minister plan, now how!

sentences.zh: 秦王聞之，怒，彊起武安君，武安君遂稱病甐。

translations.text: Qin Wang heard, angry, strong raised Wu An Jun, Wu An Jun then claimed illness du.

sentences.zh: 應侯請之，不起。

translations.text: Ying Hou requested him, not rise.

sentences.zh: 於是免武安君為士伍，遷之陰密。

translations.text: Then dismissed Wu An Jun as common soldier, moved to Yin Mi.

sentences.zh: 武安君病，未能行。

translations.text: Wu An Jun ill, could not go.

sentences.zh: 居三月，諸侯攻秦軍急，秦軍數卻，使者日至。

translations.text: Dwell three months, feudal lords attacked Qin army urgent, Qin army several retreated, messengers day arrived.

sentences.zh: 秦王乃使人遣白起，不得留咸陽中。

translations.text: Qin Wang then made person sent Bai Qi, not allow stay Xian Yang.

sentences.zh: 武安君既行，出咸陽西門十里，至杜郵。

translations.text: Wu An Jun already went, emerged Xian Yang west gate ten li, arrived Du You.

sentences.zh: 秦昭王與應侯群臣議曰：「白起之遷，其意尚怏怏不服，有餘言。」

translations.text: Qin Zhao Wang with Ying Hou ministers discussed: Bai Qi migrate, his intention still discontent not submit, have surplus words.

sentences.zh: 秦王乃使使者賜之劍，自裁。

translations.text: Qin Wang then made messenger grant sword, self execute.

sentences.zh: 武安君引劍將自剄，曰：「我何罪于天而至此哉？」

translations.text: Wu An Jun drew sword about self stab, said: I what crime heaven arrive this!

sentences.zh: 良久，曰：「我固當死。

translations.text: Long time, said: I certainly should die.

sentences.zh: 長平之戰，趙卒降者數十萬人，我詐而盡阬之，是足以死。」

translations.text: Chang Ping battle, Zhao troops surrender several tens thousand people, I deceived all pit killed them, this sufficient die.

sentences.zh: 遂自殺。

translations.text: Then self killed.

sentences.zh: 武安君之死也，以秦昭王五十年十一月。

translations.text: Wu An Jun death, with Qin Zhao Wang fifty years eleven month.

sentences.zh: 死而非其罪，秦人憐之，鄉邑皆祭祀焉。

translations.text: Died not his crime, Qin people pitied him, villages all sacrificed.

Qin Wang made Wang He replace Ling general, eight nine months surrounded Han Dan, could not take. Chu made Chun Shen Jun and Wei Gong Zi led troops several tens thousand attacked Qin army, Qin army many lost perished. Wu An Jun said: Qin not listen minister plan, now how! Qin Wang heard, angry, strong raised Wu An Jun, Wu An Jun then claimed illness du. Ying Hou requested him, not rise. Then dismissed Wu An Jun as common soldier, moved to Yin Mi. Wu An Jun ill, could not go. Dwell three months, feudal lords attacked Qin army urgent, Qin army several retreated, messengers day arrived. Qin Wang then made person sent Bai Qi, not allow stay Xian Yang. Wu An Jun already went, emerged Xian Yang west gate ten li, arrived Du You. Qin Zhao Wang with Ying Hou ministers discussed: Bai Qi migrate, his intention still discontent not submit, have surplus words. Qin Wang then made messenger grant sword, self execute. Wu An Jun drew sword about self stab, said: I what crime heaven arrive this! Long time, said: I certainly should die. Chang Ping battle, Zhao troops surrender several tens thousand people, I deceived all pit killed them, this sufficient die. Then self killed. Wu An Jun death, with Qin Zhao Wang fifty years eleven month. Died not his crime, Qin people pitied him, villages all sacrificed.

sentences.zh: 王翦者，頻陽東鄉人也。

translations.text: Wang Jian, Bin Yang east village man.

sentences.zh: 少而好兵，事秦始皇。

translations.text: Young liked troops, served Qin Shi Huang.

sentences.zh: 始皇十一年，翦將攻趙閼與，破之，拔九城，十八年，翦將攻趙。

translations.text: Shi Huang eleven years, Jian general attacked Zhao Yan Yu, broke it, took nine cities, eighteen years, Jian general attacked Zhao.

sentences.zh: 歲餘，遂拔趙，趙王降，盡定趙地為郡。

translations.text: Year more, then took Zhao, Zhao Wang surrendered, all pacified Zhao land as jun.

sentences.zh: 明年，燕使荊軻為賊於秦，秦王使王翦攻燕。

translations.text: Next year, Yan made Jing Ke assassin Qin, Qin Wang made Wang Jian attack Yan.

sentences.zh: 燕王喜走遼東，翦遂定燕薊而還。

translations.text: Yan Wang Xi fled Liao Dong, Jian then pacified Yan Ji returned.

sentences.zh: 秦使翦子王賁擊荊，荊兵敗。

translations.text: Qin made Jian son Wang Ben attack Jing, Jing troops defeated.

sentences.zh: 還擊魏，魏王降，遂定魏地。

translations.text: Returned attacked Wei, Wei Wang surrendered, then pacified Wei land.

Wang Jian, Bin Yang east village man. Young liked troops, served Qin Shi Huang. Shi Huang eleven years, Jian general attacked Zhao Yan Yu, broke it, took nine cities, eighteen years, Jian general attacked Zhao. Year more, then took Zhao, Zhao Wang surrendered, all pacified Zhao land as jun. Next year, Yan made Jing Ke assassin Qin, Qin Wang made Wang Jian attack Yan. Yan Wang Xi fled Liao Dong, Jian then pacified Yan Ji returned. Qin made Jian son Wang Ben attack Jing, Jing troops defeated. Returned attacked Wei, Wei Wang surrendered, then pacified Wei land.

sentences.zh: 秦始皇既滅三晉，走燕王，而數破荊師。

translations.text: Qin Shi Huang already extinguished three Jin, routed Yan Wang, several broke Jing troops.

sentences.zh: 秦將李信者，年少壯勇，嘗以兵數千逐燕太子丹至於衍水中，卒破得丹，始皇以為賢勇。

translations.text: Qin general Li Xin, year young strong brave, once with troops several thousand pursued Yan crown prince Dan to Yan Shui, finally broke obtained Dan, Shi Huang considered worthy brave.

sentences.zh: 於是始皇問李信：「吾欲攻取荊，於將軍度用幾何人而足？」

translations.text: Then Shi Huang asked Li Xin: I wish attack take Jing, to general estimate use how many people sufficient?

sentences.zh: 李信曰：「不過用二十萬人。」

translations.text: Li Xin said: Not exceed use twenty thousand people.

sentences.zh: 始皇問王翦，王翦曰：「非六十萬人不可。」

translations.text: Shi Huang asked Wang Jian, Wang Jian said: Not sixty thousand people not acceptable.

sentences.zh: 始皇曰：「王將軍老矣，何怯也！

translations.text: Shi Huang said: Wang general old, why timid!

sentences.zh: 李將軍果勢壯勇，其言是也。」

translations.text: Li general indeed powerful brave, his words correct.

sentences.zh: 遂使李信及蒙恬將二十萬南伐荊。

translations.text: Then made Li Xin and Meng Tian general twenty thousand south attack Jing.

sentences.zh: 王翦言不用，因謝病，歸老於頻陽。

translations.text: Wang Jian words not used, because claimed illness, returned old Bin Yang.

sentences.zh: 李信攻平與，蒙恬攻寢，大破荊軍。

translations.text: Li Xin attacked Ping Yu, Meng Tian attacked Qin, greatly broke Jing army.

sentences.zh: 信又攻鄢郢，破之，於是引兵而西，與蒙恬會城父。

translations.text: Xin moreover attacked Yan Ying, broke it, then led troops west, with Meng Tian met Cheng Fu.

sentences.zh: 荊人因隨之，三日三夜不頓舍，大破李信軍，入兩壁，殺七都尉，秦軍走。

translations.text: Jing people because followed them, three days three nights not rested camped, greatly broke Li Xin army, entered two walls, killed seven du wei, Qin army fled.

Qin Shi Huang already extinguished three Jin, routed Yan Wang, several broke Jing troops. Qin general Li Xin, year young strong brave, once with troops several thousand pursued Yan crown prince Dan to Yan Shui, finally broke obtained Dan, Shi Huang considered worthy brave. Then Shi Huang asked Li Xin: I wish attack take Jing, to general estimate use how many people sufficient? Li Xin said: Not exceed use twenty thousand people. Shi Huang asked Wang Jian, Wang Jian said: Not sixty thousand people not acceptable. Shi Huang said: Wang general old, why timid! Li general indeed powerful brave, his words correct. Then made Li Xin and Meng Tian general twenty thousand south attack Jing. Wang Jian words not used, because claimed illness, returned old Bin Yang. Li Xin attacked Ping Yu, Meng Tian attacked Qin, greatly broke Jing army. Xin moreover attacked Yan Ying, broke it, then led troops west, with Meng Tian met Cheng Fu. Jing people because followed them, three days three nights not rested camped, greatly broke Li Xin army, entered two walls, killed seven du wei, Qin army fled.

sentences.zh: 始皇聞之，大怒，自馳如頻陽，見謝王翦曰：「寡人以不用將軍計，李信果辱秦軍。

translations.text: Shi Huang heard, greatly angry, personally galloped like Bin Yang, saw apologized Wang Jian: I with not use general plan, Li Xin indeed humiliated Qin army.

sentences.zh: 今聞荊兵日進而西，將軍雖病，獨忍棄寡人乎！」

translations.text: Now heard Jing troops day advance west, general though ill, alone endure abandon I?

sentences.zh: 王翦謝曰：「老臣罷病悖亂，唯大王更擇賢將。」

translations.text: Wang Jian apologized: Old minister tired ill confused, wish great wang moreover choose worthy general.

sentences.zh: 始皇謝曰：「已矣，將軍勿復言！」

translations.text: Shi Huang apologized: Already, general not again speak!

sentences.zh: 王翦曰：「大王必不得已用臣，非六十萬人不可。」

translations.text: Wang Jian said: Great wang certainly cannot already use minister, not sixty thousand people not acceptable.

sentences.zh: 始皇曰：「為聽將軍計耳。」

translations.text: Shi Huang said: For listen general plan.

sentences.zh: 於是王翦將兵六十萬人，始皇自送至灞上。

translations.text: Then Wang Jian led troops sixty thousand people, Shi Huang personally sent to Ba Shang.

sentences.zh: 王翦行，請美田宅園池甚眾。

translations.text: Wang Jian went, requested beautiful fields houses gardens pools very many.

sentences.zh: 始皇曰：「將軍行矣，何憂貧乎？」

translations.text: Shi Huang said: General go, why worry poor?

sentences.zh: 王翦曰：「為大王將，有功終不得封侯，故及大王之向臣，臣亦及時以請園池為子孫業耳。」

translations.text: Wang Jian said: For great wang general, have merit finally not obtain enfeoff hou, therefore take great wang favor minister, minister also timely request gardens pools for sons grandsons industry.

sentences.zh: 始皇大笑。

translations.text: Shi Huang greatly laughed.

sentences.zh: 王翦既至關，使使還請善田者五輩。

translations.text: Wang Jian already to pass, made messenger return requested good fields five times.

sentences.zh: 或曰：「將軍之乞貸，亦已甚矣。」

translations.text: Some said: General beg borrow, also extreme.

sentences.zh: 王翦曰：「不然。

translations.text: Wang Jian said: Not so.

sentences.zh: 夫秦王怚而不信人。

translations.text: Qin Wang suspicious not trust people.

sentences.zh: 今空秦國甲士而專委於我，我不多請田宅為子孫業以自堅，顧令秦王坐而疑我邪？」

translations.text: Now empty Qin state armored soldiers all entrust me, I not much request fields houses for sons grandsons industry self strengthen, instead make Qin Wang sit doubt me?

Shi Huang heard, greatly angry, personally galloped like Bin Yang, saw apologized Wang Jian: I with not use general plan, Li Xin indeed humiliated Qin army. Now heard Jing troops day advance west, general though ill, alone endure abandon I? Wang Jian apologized: Old minister tired ill confused, wish great wang moreover choose worthy general. Shi Huang apologized: Already, general not again speak! Wang Jian said: Great wang certainly cannot already use minister, not sixty thousand people not acceptable. Shi Huang said: For listen general plan. Then Wang Jian led troops sixty thousand people, Shi Huang personally sent to Ba Shang. Wang Jian went, requested beautiful fields houses gardens pools very many. Shi Huang said: General go, why worry poor? Wang Jian said: For great wang general, have merit finally not obtain enfeoff hou, therefore take great wang favor minister, minister also timely request gardens pools for sons grandsons industry. Shi Huang greatly laughed. Wang Jian already to pass, made messenger return requested good fields five times. Some said: General beg borrow, also extreme. Wang Jian said: Not so. Qin Wang suspicious not trust people. Now empty Qin state armored soldiers all entrust me, I not much request fields houses for sons grandsons industry self strengthen, instead make Qin Wang sit doubt me?

sentences.zh: 王翦果代李信擊荊。

translations.text: Wang Jian indeed replaced Li Xin attacked Jing.

sentences.zh: 荊聞王翦益軍而來，乃悉國中兵以拒秦。

translations.text: Jing heard Wang Jian increased troops come, then all state troops resisted Qin.

sentences.zh: 王翦至，堅壁而守之，不肯戰。

translations.text: Wang Jian arrived, firm walls guarded, not willing battle.

sentences.zh: 荊兵數出挑戰，終不出。

translations.text: Jing troops several emerged challenged, finally not emerge.

sentences.zh: 王翦日休士洗沐，而善飲食撫循之，親與士卒同食。

translations.text: Wang Jian day rested soldiers washed bathed, good ate drank stroked followed them, personally with soldiers ate together.

sentences.zh: 久之，王翦使人問軍中戲乎？

translations.text: Long time, Wang Jian made person asked army play?

sentences.zh: 對曰：「方投石超距。」

translations.text: Replied: Just throwing stones jumping distances.

sentences.zh: 於是王翦曰：「士卒可用矣。」

translations.text: Then Wang Jian said: Soldiers usable.

sentences.zh: 荊數挑戰而秦不出，乃引而東。

translations.text: Jing several challenged Qin not emerge, then led east.

sentences.zh: 翦因舉兵追之，令壯士擊，大破荊軍。

translations.text: Jian because raised troops pursued them, ordered strong men attacked, greatly broke Jing army.

sentences.zh: 至蘄南，殺其將軍項燕，荊兵遂敗走。

translations.text: To Qi south, killed their general Xiang Yan, Jing troops then defeated fled.

sentences.zh: 秦因乘勝略定荊地城邑。

translations.text: Qin because multiplied victory roughly pacified Jing land cities.

sentences.zh: 歲餘，虜荊王負芻，竟平荊地為郡縣。

translations.text: Year more, captured Jing Wang Fu Chou, finally pacified Jing land as jun county.

sentences.zh: 因南征百越之君。

translations.text: Because south attacked Bai Yue lords.

sentences.zh: 而王翦子王賁，與李信破定燕、齊地。

translations.text: Wang Jian son Wang Ben, with Li Xin broke pacified Yan Qi land.

Wang Jian indeed replaced Li Xin attacked Jing. Jing heard Wang Jian increased troops come, then all state troops resisted Qin. Wang Jian arrived, firm walls guarded, not willing battle. Jing troops several emerged challenged, finally not emerge. Wang Jian day rested soldiers washed bathed, good ate drank stroked followed them, personally with soldiers ate together. Long time, Wang Jian made person asked army play? Replied: Just throwing stones jumping distances. Then Wang Jian said: Soldiers usable. Jing several challenged Qin not emerge, then led east. Jian because raised troops pursued them, ordered strong men attacked, greatly broke Jing army. To Qi south, killed their general Xiang Yan, Jing troops then defeated fled. Qin because multiplied victory roughly pacified Jing land cities. Year more, captured Jing Wang Fu Chou, finally pacified Jing land as jun county. Because south attacked Bai Yue lords. Wang Jian son Wang Ben, with Li Xin broke pacified Yan Qi land.

sentences.zh: 秦始皇二十六年，盡并天下，王氏、蒙氏功為多，名施於後世。

translations.text: Qin Shi Huang twenty six years, all merged world, Wang clan, Meng clan merit most, name applied later generations.
Qin Shi Huang twenty six years, all merged world, Wang clan, Meng clan merit most, name applied later generations.

sentences.zh: 秦二世之時，王翦及其子賁皆已死，而又滅蒙氏。

translations.text: Qin Er Shi time, Wang Jian and his son Ben all already died, moreover extinguished Meng clan.

sentences.zh: 陳勝之反秦，秦使王翦之孫王離擊趙，圍趙王及張耳鉅鹿城。

translations.text: Chen Sheng rebel Qin, Qin made Wang Jian grandson Wang Li attacked Zhao, surrounded Zhao Wang and Zhang Er Ju Lu city.

sentences.zh: 或曰：「王離，秦之名將也。

translations.text: Some said: Wang Li, Qin famous general.

sentences.zh: 今將彊秦之兵，攻新造之趙，舉之必矣。」

translations.text: Now will strong Qin troops, attack new made Zhao, raise certainly.

sentences.zh: 客曰：「不然。

translations.text: Guest said: Not so.

sentences.zh: 夫為將三世者必敗。

translations.text: Be general three generations certainly defeat.

sentences.zh: 必敗者何也？

translations.text: Certainly defeat why?

sentences.zh: 必其所殺伐多矣，其後受其不祥。

translations.text: Certainly their killed attacked many, after receive not auspicious.

sentences.zh: 今王離已三世將矣。」

translations.text: Now Wang Li already three generations general.

sentences.zh: 居無何，項羽救趙，擊秦軍，果虜王離，王離軍遂降諸侯。

translations.text: Dwell no what, Xiang Yu saved Zhao, attacked Qin army, indeed captured Wang Li, Wang Li army then surrendered feudal lords.

Qin Er Shi time, Wang Jian and his son Ben all already died, moreover extinguished Meng clan. Chen Sheng rebel Qin, Qin made Wang Jian grandson Wang Li attacked Zhao, surrounded Zhao Wang and Zhang Er Ju Lu city. Some said: Wang Li, Qin famous general. Now will strong Qin troops, attack new made Zhao, raise certainly. Guest said: Not so. Be general three generations certainly defeat. Certainly defeat why? Certainly their killed attacked many, after receive not auspicious. Now Wang Li already three generations general. Dwell no what, Xiang Yu saved Zhao, attacked Qin army, indeed captured Wang Li, Wang Li army then surrendered feudal lords.

sentences.zh: 太史公曰：鄙語云「尺有所短，寸有所長」。

translations.text: Grand Historian said: Low saying: Chi have short, cun have long.

sentences.zh: 白起料敵合變，出奇無窮，聲震天下，然不能救患於應侯。

translations.text: Bai Qi calculated enemy changed, emerged strange without limit, sound shook world, yet could not save calamity Ying Hou.

sentences.zh: 王翦為秦將，夷六國，當是時，翦為宿將，始皇師之，然不能輔秦建德，固其根本，偷合取容，以至圽身。

translations.text: Wang Jian for Qin general, pacified six states, when that time, Jian as veteran general, Shi Huang respected him, yet could not assist Qin establish virtue, solidify root, stolen united took favor, to buried body.

sentences.zh: 及孫王離為項羽所虜，不亦宜乎！

translations.text: To grandson Wang Li for Xiang Yu captured, not also suitable!

sentences.zh: 彼各有所短也。

translations.text: They each have their shortcomings.

Grand Historian said: Low saying: Chi have short, cun have long. Bai Qi calculated enemy changed, emerged strange without limit, sound shook world, yet could not save calamity Ying Hou. Wang Jian for Qin general, pacified six states, when that time, Jian as veteran general, Shi Huang respected him, yet could not assist Qin establish virtue, solidify root, stolen united took favor, to buried body. To grandson Wang Li for Xiang Yu captured, not also suitable! They each have their shortcomings.
